seo-description: App to chat privately with a selected user or publicly with a group of users
title: Live Chat
subtitle: App to chat privately with a selected user or publicly with a group of users
description: This is a classic chat application. The user can chat with other online users either in private chat with selected participant(s) or publicly with a group.
technologies-list: React, Tachions, Node.js, Socket.io, GitHub Pages, Heroku
